Ikal Angelei bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na Kenya

E nyere ya Goldman Environmental Prize na 2012, ọkachasị maka nkwupụta ya banyere mmetụta gburugburu ebe obibi nke Gilgel Gibe III Dam, na-ekwu maka obodo ndị Kenya. Ọ bụ onye guzobere ọgbakọ Friends of Lake Turkana nke na-akwado maka ikpe ziri ezi gburugburu ebe obibi na mpaghara gburugburu ọdọ mmiri Turkan.
